video_prompt: Anime character's hair gently sways as she subtly blushes, eyes shifting from menu to viewer. She delicately adjusts her grip on the open menu. Restaurant screens cycle through food displays, casting shifting light.
image_prompt: Anime character, dark brown hair, light skin, cream collared shirt, black skirt, holding open menu, serene gaze, dark brown eyes, subtle blush, light brown lips, sitting at wooden table in dimly lit restaurant.
refined_video_prompt: Her anime hair gently sways. A subtle blush warms her cheeks as her eyes smoothly track from the menu to the viewer. She delicately adjusts her grip on the open menu. Restaurant screens actively cycle through food displays, casting dynamic, shifting light.
